content: CP P/M 680 Lids Caps to cover firestop cast-in devices ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection ### FEATURES:Features Available for pipe diameters of 2, 3, 4 and 6 The easy way to cover firestop cast-in sleeves before running the pipes Lids compliant with OSHA fall protection requirements Applications For use with the CP 680/CFS-CID cast-in device ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2030686 - 2 lid for CP 680-P - Package Size 15 pc - 2030687 - 3 lid for CP 680-P - Package Size 15 pc - 2030688 - 4 lid for CP 680-P - Package Size 8 pc - 2102433 - Lid CP 680-P 6 - Package Size 16 pc
